EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Transformation_Council_SF_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Transformation Council in San Francisco September 19-20
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming The Pivotal Transformation Council in San Francisco from September 19–20. We look forward to your participation.
Agenda Overview
Monday, September 19: Private Dinner 6:30–10:00pm
Location: Perbacco <[[http://www.perbaccosf.com/]]>, 230 California Street, San Francisco, CA 94111
Tuesday, September 20: Transformation Talk & Workshop
Location: The Pearl SF <[[http://thepearlsf.com/]]>, 601 19th St, San Francisco, CA 94107
We recommend public transportation or ridesharing to both locations as street parking is limited.
The Pivotal Transformation Team
P.S. Please let us know if you have any dietary restrictions by emailing events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
